readme_content:
About Me 👋
Hi there! I'm a passionate developer with experience in PHP, Kotlin, Java, and MongoDB. I enjoy building robust applications, optimizing database structures, and creating efficient back-end systems.

💻 Tech Stack:
Languages: PHP, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript
Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
Tools & Frameworks: Android Studio, Visual Studio Code, Firebase
Development Areas: Development, CRUD operations, 
🚀 Current Projects:
Implementing a management system in PHP 
Building a MongoDB CRUD system in Java
Integrating Firebase into Android applications
🌱 Always Learning:
I'm constantly expanding my knowledge in modern technologies and best practices in software development. Currently, I'm exploring advanced database optimization and cloud services.

📫 Feel free to connect with me or check out my projects!

hugoalcala/ProyectoHibernate.summary: Recent activities in Hugo Alcala's ProyectoHibernate repository include adding data for teams and players in the database tables through two PushEvents on February 3 and 4, 2025.

hugoalcala/psp-cpp.summary: PushEvent activities in psp-cpp repository occurred on February 20, 2025, with a message indicating updates on the 4th and 20th of February.

profile_summary: As a seasoned developer, I specialize in designing and building scalable applications using C++ and Java, with a strong focus on optimizing database structures for improved performance. With hands-on experience in a wide range of tools and technologies, including PHP, Kotlin, MongoDB, and Firebase, I excel at crafting efficient back-end systems and refining complex development tasks.
